original: @111a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @111a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:üîΩSahajashataka

original: sa ha dza sha ta ka / bod skad du /
analyzed: sa ha dza sha ta ka / bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: lhan cig skyes pa drug pa /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa drug pa /
translated: The Sixth on Innate Union

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Vajra Holder.

original: rtag dang chad las nges grol ba //
analyzed: rtag dang chad las nges grol ba //
translated: Definitely freed from eternalism and nihilism,

original: de nyid bde gshegs rnams kyis bzhed //
analyzed: de nyid bde gshegs rnams kyis bzhed //
translated: Thatness is accepted by the Sugatas.

original: rang bzhin las skyes chos rnams la //
analyzed: rang bzhin las skyes chos rnams la //
translated: In phenomena born from the nature,

original: sgrub dang sel bar phyag ni brjod //
analyzed: sgrub dang sel bar phyag ni brjod //
translated: Accomplishment and removal are expressed.

original: yod par smra ba la brjod pa //
analyzed: yod par smra ba la brjod pa //
translated: To the proponents of existence it is said:

original: thams cad rnam par dpyad na med //
analyzed: thams cad rnam par dpyad na med //
translated: When everything is analyzed, it does not exist.

original: med par smra ba la brjod pa//
analyzed: med par smra ba la brjod pa//
translated: To the proponents of nonexistence it is said:

original: rnam par dpyad na thams cad yod //
analyzed: rnam par dpyad na thams cad yod //
translated: When analyzed, everything exists.

original: ji lta ji ltar sgro btags pa //
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar sgro btags pa //
translated: However much there is superimposition,

original: de nyid rnal 'byor pa rnams skye //
analyzed: de nyid rnal 'byor pa rnams skye //
translated: That much is born for yogins.

original: de lta de ltar sgro btags pa //
analyzed: de lta de ltar sgro btags pa //
translated: However much there is superimposition,

original: rnal 'byor de nyid kyis ni 'joms //
analyzed: rnal 'byor de nyid kyis ni 'joms //
translated: That much is destroyed by the yogin's reality.

original: gang phyir lhan cig skyes ma bcos //
analyzed: gang phyir lhan cig skyes ma bcos //
translated: Because of the unfabricated innate,

original: de phyir dogs med lhan cig skyes //
analyzed: de phyir dogs med lhan cig skyes //
translated: Therefore, the innate is free from doubt.

original: bde bas lhan cig skyes gzhan min //
analyzed: bde bas lhan cig skyes gzhan min //
translated: Bliss is not other than the innate;

original: bde ba dogs pa med mtshan nyid //
analyzed: bde ba dogs pa med mtshan nyid //
translated: Bliss is characterized by freedom from doubt.

original: shes phyir dogs pa med pa'i bdag / dbyer med rtogs pa dam pa bde //
analyzed: shes phyir dogs pa med pa'i bdag / dbyer med rtogs pa dam pa bde //
translated: is the highest realization of inseparability.

original: sna tshogs rang rig rtogs byas pas //
analyzed: sna tshogs rang rig rtogs byas pas //
translated: By realizing the variety of self-awareness,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rgya mtshor nub /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rgya mtshor nub /
translated: one sinks into the ocean of the connate.

original: sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The yogin of the reality of mantra

original: dogs med don la rab tu gnas //
analyzed: dogs med don la rab tu gnas //
translated: is well-established in the meaning of freedom from doubt.

original: srid pa yang 'di bla mar byas //
analyzed: srid pa yang 'di bla mar byas //
translated: Existence is also made supreme by this.

original: dogs pa med pa'i yul gyis ston //üîΩlhan cig skyes pa drug pa bla ma mee tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dogs pa med pa'i yul gyis ston // lhan cig skyes pa drug pa bla ma mee tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The connate is taught by the object of freedom from doubt.üîΩThe connate composed by Maitrƒ´pa is complete.

original: // / bla ma badzra p'a ni dang / mtshur gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / bla ma badzra p'a ni dang / mtshur gyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated by Lama VajrapƒÅ·πái and Tsur.
